2. Copy "AssassinsCreedIIGame.exe" to game directory
3. Play until you reach the animus and the game freezez :)

To install save files go into. 
C:\Program Files (x86)\Ubisoft\Ubisoft Game Launcher\storage
Look for the folder that's completely filled with random chracters and open it, open 4, replace 1.save with the 1.save in the .rar archive.

http://www.computerandvideogames.com/article.php?id=237648?cid=OTC-RSS&attr=CVG-General-RSS

Ubisoft has told CVG that reports of its new always-online DRM system having been cracked already are false.

"You have probably seen rumors on the web that Assassin's Creed II and Silent Hunter 5 have been cracked," it said in reference to the earlier report of submarine sim Silent Hunter 5 having been cracked to work without being online constantly.

Ubi added: "Please know that this rumor is false and while a pirated version may seem to be complete at start up, any gamer who downloads and plays a cracked version will find that their version is not complete."

Installation of game & crack !
------------------------------------------------

crack here:

http://torrents.thepiratebay.org/5410279/Assassins_Creed_II_Crack_v2_-WBB.5410279.TP

1. YOU MUST DISCONNECT FROM THE INTERNET AND REBOOT YOUR PC TO FREE MEMNETSPACE
2. Install the Game from CD or Virtual Image. 
3. Dont connect to the internet yet.
4. Copy crack files to the location, apply changes and reboot PC once again.
5. Create some UBI account 
6. When asked for activation just press continue 
7. Next open REGEDIT and find on it : Ubiactivate REG_SZ, and change value from 1 to 0.
8. Just play :)
